name: IT 201 Sprint 03
description:
IT 201 Project - Sprint 03

This project is a build on the previous version. In sprint three, I have updated from basic shapes to a combination of shapes. These shapes are no longer static, and each variation has a dynamic aspect to it. The user can change the speed of the animation of each object set or have it set to randomly select the speed. The user also has a toggle option that will randomize the animation each shape takes, or they can pick from a drop-down menu. Previous attributes like the glow or opacity of objects is still available so the user can change it on the fly.
